name: Launch Agency
tagline: Launching: its not just for start-ups
description:
Launching: it's not just for start-ups. It's a mindset - and it's what the most successful companies do every day to innovate their way to the top. LAUNCH partners with these companies - using consumer insight to guide the flight path and creativity as fuel - to help them get there, and stay there. Specialties Consumer-facing service, retail and consumer package goods businesses.
Launch is an independent, full-service agency with 25 years' experience succesfully launching fast-growth brands and relaunching mature brands. The secret to our success? A seasoned professional blend of insight, instinct, ingenious use of creativity and collaborative client relationships.
READ MORE...
